original_text: Someone may have many children and he may live for a long time. But even if he lives until he is very old, he may not enjoy a good life. After he dies, people may not bury him with honour. His life would be useless. Even a child that is dead at birth is happier than that person. That is what I think.
korean_text: 사람이 비록 백 명의 자녀를 낳고 또 장수하여 사는 날이 많을지라도 그의 영혼은 그러한 행복으로 만족하지 못하고 또 그가 안장되지 못하면 나는 이르기를 낙태된 자가 그보다는 낫다 하나니

sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람은 아이를 많이 가질 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and he may live for a long time
But even if he lives until he is very old
he may not enjoy a good life
sentences.korean_translation: 좋은 삶을 누리지 못할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: people may not bury him with honour
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그를 명예롭게 장사지내지 않을 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: Even a child that is dead at birth
